title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo
description: Retrieve system & browser information, e.g. window.location.href
author: Tobias Beer
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo/readme", "text": "The plugin $:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo provides: ; <<sysinfo scope property>> : a macro returning system information from the browser ''window'' object !! Parameters ; scope : either ''env'', which returns `browser` or `node` : or a toplevel scope of the window object, allowed are
» ''location'', ''navigator'', ''document'' ; property : a property to read from the scope, e.g.:
» ''location'': `href`, `host`, `pathname`, `protocol`
» ''navigator'': `appCodeName`, `language`, `platform`, `userAgent`
» ''document'': `contentType`, `domain`, `title`, `lastModified` !! Example `<>` > <>" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo/sysinfo.js": { "text": "/*\ title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo/sysinfo.js type: application/javascript module-type: macro <>, e.g: <> @preserve \*/ (function(){"use strict";exports.name="sysinfo";exports.params=[{name:"scope"},{name:"property"}];exports.run=function(n,e){if(["env","document","location","navigator"].indexOf(n)>=0){if(n==="env"){return $tw.browser?"browser":$tw.node?"node":"unknown"}else{try{return window[n][e].toString()}catch(o){}}}}})();", "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/sysinfo/sysinfo.js", "type": "application/javascript", "module-type": "macro" } } }
